Articles.Content: Which mod pack has the best Ion engine? in terms of ease of use, style, impulse thrust, and energy usage?
For a large ion engine use deep space mission pack you could cfg edit to make smaller ion engines and batterys.
I would recommend you ion engines from satellite pack MMI http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/13692-Mechanical-Mouse-Industries-Kethane-Payload-Packs-Released!!!
hmm i think there is an a mod for ION thruster pack on the spaceport
KSPX has a 1.25m ion engine that performs exactly like two stock probe-size ions. You really can't do better in terms of getting a larger ion with stock looks and balance.
Make sure you get the Ion Engine sounds mod, because it makes ion engines a million times better.
